::KitKat::

She looked at Drilbit. "I won't.  I can't leave you and the others."
She layed head down and closed her eyes.  She was having to 
concentrate on breathing.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> DrillBit layed KitKat down, since they wern't going anywhere.
> He looked at her wounds, and he could see the pain in her face. He
> almost broke down. He took her hand, and heald it. He put the other 
on
> the side of her face. He could hear her respetory coolent system,
> shuting down.
> "Dont die, on me. I love you."
